name: 环境展示
description: 用于建立场景和展示环境的模板

variables.name: location_type
variables.example: outdoor rooftop, indoor classroom, city street

variables.name: space_layout
variables.example: medium-sized rectangular rooftop, chain-link fence around perimeter

variables.name: key_objects
variables.example: rusty chain-link fence, old wooden bench, potted plants, air conditioning units

variables.name: background_elements
variables.example: city skyline visible beyond fence, distant mountains

variables.name: time_of_day
variables.example: late afternoon, golden hour around 4-5 PM

variables.name: weather
variables.example: clear sunny day, partly cloudy sky with fluffy white clouds

variables.name: lighting
variables.example: warm golden sunlight from west, soft diffused lighting, long shadows

variables.name: color_palette
variables.example: warm golden yellow, soft blue sky, red-brown rust, green plants

variations: extreme long shot: vast environment, small scale
long shot: establishing context, show full scene
wide angle: emphasize space and depth

quality_modifiers.HIGH: , highly detailed environment, ultra realistic, 8k, atmospheric, professional photography
quality_modifiers.PREMIUM: , masterpiece, ultra detailed environment, 8k uhd, atmospheric, professional photography, cinematic composition

lighting_presets.golden_hour: warm golden sunlight, soft shadows, 3500K color temperature, magical atmosphere
lighting_presets.overcast: soft diffused light, minimal shadows, even illumination, muted colors
lighting_presets.night: artificial lights, deep shadows, high contrast, cool blue tones
lighting_presets.sunrise: warm orange light, long shadows, fresh atmosphere, cool to warm gradient

season_indicators.spring: cherry blossom petals, fresh green leaves, comfortable temperature
season_indicators.summer: bright sunlight, lush vegetation, heat haze
season_indicators.autumn: falling leaves, warm colors, crisp air
season_indicators.winter: bare trees, cold atmosphere, possible snow

negative_prompt: cluttered, messy, low quality, poor composition, unbalanced, distorted perspective, unrealistic lighting
usage_notes: 此模板专注于环境氛围和场景建立。使用详细的空间描述和光线信息。适合用于场景开场和环境转换。
